USA: Pierre Dugua, Sieur de Mons settles Saint Croix Island in Maine.
Taiwan: Sino-Dutch conflicts: Dutch envoy Wijbrand van Waerwijck and his army are ordered to occupy Penghu in order to open trade with China
Russia: False Dmitriy I, a man claiming to be the deceased Dmitriy Ivanovich, invaded Muscovy.
Indonesia: A second English East India Company voyage commanded by Sir Henry Middleton reaches Ternate, Tidore, Ambon and Banda. Fierce VOC hostility is encountered in Banda thus beginning Anglo-Dutch competition for access to spices
China: The grand secretary Gu Xiancheng reopened the Donglin Academy in Wuxi, establishing the Donglin movement.
Chile: A fort established in 1602 at the ruins of Valdivia is abandoned.
Belgium: End of the Siege of Ostend
